title: How to Convert PRN Files to PDF

steps.title: Open File-Converter-Online.com’s PRN to PDF converter in a browser.
steps.content: Open File-Converter-Online.com’s PRN to PDF converter in a browser. Type prn-to-pdf.file-converter-online.com into your internet browser's address bar, and hit ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return on your keyboard.

steps.title: Click the blue Choose File button.
steps.content: Click the blue Choose File button. This button is located below the PRN to PDF heading on the left-hand side of the page. Your file explorer will pop up in a new window.

steps.title: Select the PRN file you want to convert.
steps.content: Select the PRN file you want to convert. Find the file you want to convert in the file explorer window, and click it.

steps.title: Click the Open button in the pop-up.
steps.content: Click the Open button in the pop-up. This will upload your file to the online converter.

steps.title: Select pdf next to Choose filetype.
steps.content: Select pdf next to Choose filetype. Click the drop-down menu next to the Choose filetype option, and select pdf to convert your PRN file to PDF.

steps.title: Click the Start Converting button.
steps.content: Click the Start Converting button. This is a red button located below the Choose filetype option. It will convert your PRN file to PDF, and download the PDF file to your computer.
